effect.x-y: Raises the user’s evasion by two stages. stomp and steamroller have double power against Pokémon that have used this move since entering the field.
effect.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Raises the user’s evasion by two stages. stomp and steamroller have double power against Pokémon that have used this move since entering the field.

short_effect.x-y: Raises the user’s evasion by two stages.
short_effect.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Raises the user’s evasion by two stages.

flavor_text.x-y: The user compresses its body to make itself look smaller, which sharply raises its evasiveness.
flavor_text.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: The user compresses its body to make itself look smaller, which sharply raises its evasiveness.
